snippet.title: Shang Mu Architect - Campaign Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Hello, everyone! The campaign mode demo for "Freedom Planet: Shang Mu Architect" is finally ready to play!

Y'all can always check the releases page for the latest updates to Shang Mu Architect!

https://github.com/whitelilydragon/ShangMuArchitect/releases

Please report any bugs to the GitHub issue tracker! It's the easiest way for me to keep track of issues and feature requests for the fan game:

https://github.com/whitelilydragon/ShangMuArchitect/issues

We also have a very active Discord community for the fan game! This is where y'all can download weekly builds between stable releases, and share your stages with other players!

https://discord.gg/shangmuarchitect

I also have a Patreon for SMA, with permission from GalaxyTrail!

If I can reach $300/m, I can go part-time at my hospital EVS job, and have more time to work on and polish SMA to be the best fan game I can make! (And more time for Patron benefits, too!)

https://www.patreon.com/whitelilydragon

Campaign demo features:

-6 playable characters!
-3 stages
-6 cut-scenes for story mode
-4 hubs that change after each boss is defeated
-Classic Mode has 3 stages
-Time Attack is available
-Spade and Carrie's stories aren't ready, but they can be played in Classic and Time Attack

Thank you for all of your support! Let's make levels, together! ❤️
